Posts.Content: Hi I do know exactly how you feel x I finished chemotherapy in dec last year x had radiotherapy in January this year x my hair x eyebrows x eye lashes have all come back x now that I look well everyone assumes I am fine and think I can go back to work and carry on as normal x it makes me feel annoyed as everyone seems to have forgotten that I have got through this horrendous treatment but I still get extremely tired and my husband and two boys think that I can just carry on like before x
Posts.Title: Don't think I can do this anymore

Posts.Content: Aww well done x x x
Posts.Title: There Is A Chance !
